review: I consulted the doctor for second opinion for my 83 year aunty who is hospitalised in Mumbai. Had to take a critical decision in 10 hours. Dr Deepesh patiently answered all my questions even the most unimportant ones and put me at ease.  India needs more doctors like him who value and deliver humanity. GOD bless the doctor.

My doctor visit was done as per the appointment. There wasn't even 5 minutes wait time. Dr Deepesh was very calm and listened to my health issues. He explained the causes/effects with lucid clarity. He has great amount of patience to listen, which is a best quality for a doctor. Coming to the medicines, he gave tablets for 5 days stating that will suffice, which is also worth mentioning as we are in a world where antibiotics are prescribed  for everything and anything. The clinic is also very clean and the aura of the place makes you feel like you will get better after the visit. The staffs are responsive and cooperative.

Hello, my name is Manoj, and I recently saw this doctor. He is very kind and approachable.
I rarely come across doctors who discuss our issue in such detail.
However, he advised me on the steps to take, and after the echo and tmt test, he told me to perform some meditation.
I went for a heart issue, but the treated me for health and my sugar level was fluctuating..
When the test was being run, the doctor was actively keeping an eye on the patient's condition.
I will undoubtedly recommend to all of my loved ones.
We're relieved that coming to you, sir, has helped us feel as though our health problems have been resolved.

More friendly with patient, Excellent service from Mr. Deepesh, he did his job very perfect and also he taking care of my father in law very personally, we are very satisfied with his job, Thank you so much all your efforts sir and also kindly support like this your upcoming patients, Thank you and God bless
Good and cordial Doctor Did not push unnecessary things  or scare me.  Understood my concern and guide me in right direction

I had the best experience and treatment by Dr. Deepesh. He is able to treat complicated issues with high caliber using the latest innovations in cardiology. Iâ€™m glad to be under his treatment and guidance.
Doctor was so kind and explain the issues clearly, how to resolve the issue. Overall he give very good response to the patient issue.

review: The doctor was respectable, positive and kind. Overall a satisfied experience. Thank you for the assistance
